# MTLReadWriteTextureTier.tier1

**Case**

Indicates the system supports tier 1 read-write textures.

## Declaration

```swift
case tier1
```

## Discussion

Tier 1 read-write textures support the following pixel formats:

- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/r32Float]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/r32Uint]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/r32Sint]

## Enumeration cases

- **MTLReadWriteTextureTier.tier2**: Indicates the system supports tier 2 read-write textures.
- **MTLReadWriteTextureTier.tierNone**: Indicates the system doesn’t support read-write textures.
